title: Authors and Citation
text: Garcia MN (2025). simulMGF: Simulate SNP Matrix, Phenotype Genotypic Effects. R package version 0.1.1, https://github.com/mngar/simulMGF.
code: @Manual{,   title = {simulMGF: Simulate SNP Matrix, Phenotype and Genotypic Effects},   author = {Martin Nahuel Garcia},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.1},   url = {https://github.com/mngar/simulMGF}, }

what: Simulate SNP Matrix, Phenotype and Genotypic Effects
title: Simulate SNP Matrix, Phenotype and Genotypic Effects
text: Package simulate random SNP Matrix diploid organisms (coded 0, 1, 2) half sib/full sib SNP matrix real simulated parents SNP data. Simulate phenotypic traits real simulated SNP data, controlled specific number QTLs effects, sampled Normal Uniform distributions.

what: Function to simulate SNP matrix — simGeno
title: Function to simulate SNP matrix — simGeno
text: Simulate SNP matrix coded 0, 1 2; random genotypes.

title: Function to simulate SNP matrix — simGeno
Function to simulate SNP matrix — simGeno
text: Nind number individuals simulate. Nmarkers Nmarkers number SNP markers generate.

title: Function to simulate SNP matrix — simGeno
text: matrix dimensions Nind x Nmarkers.

title: Function to simulate SNP matrix — simGeno
text: Wu, R., Ma, C., & Casella, G. (2007). Statistical genetics quantitative traits: linkage, maps QTL. Springer Science & Business Media.

title: Function to simulate SNP matrix — simGeno
text: Martin Nahuel Garcia <orcid:0000-0001-5760-986X>

title: Function to simulate SNP matrix — simGeno
Function to simulate phenotypes — simPheno
text: Simulate phenotype genotype matrix QTLs random effects sampled Normal distribution.

title: Function to simulate phenotypes — simPheno
Function to simulate phenotypes — simPheno
text: x SNP matrix coded like 0 homozygous; 1 heterozygous; 2 homozygous Nqtl number QTLs simulate Esigma standard deviation effects distribution N~(0,Esigma^2) Pmean phenotype mean Perror standard deviation error (portion phenotype explained genomic information)

title: Function to simulate phenotypes — simPheno
text: object class list containing trait, markers associated effects. pheno vector trait values simulated. QTN column SNP matrix SNP associated. Meffects effects associated SNPs.

title: Function to simulate phenotypes — simPheno
text: Wu, R., Ma, C., & Casella, G. (2007). Statistical genetics quantitative traits: linkage, maps QTL. Springer Science & Business Media.

title: Function to simulate phenotypes — simPheno
text: Martin Nahuel Garcia <orcid:0000-0001-5760-986X>

title: Function to simulate phenotypes — simPheno

what: Function to simulate full sib progeny genotype — simulFS
title: Function to simulate full sib progeny genotype — simulFS
text: Simulate full sib progeny genotypes genotype parents (matrixes dimensions). Pair parents mating order matrixes. assume diploid organisms.

title: Function to simulate full sib progeny genotype — simulFS
Function to simulate full sib progeny genotype — simulFS
text: x genotype matrix set moms y genotype matrix set dads Nprogeny Nprogeny number progeny's genotypes generate pair parents

title: Function to simulate full sib progeny genotype — simulFS
text: matrix dimensions (nrow(x)*Nprogeny) x ncol(x)

title: Function to simulate full sib progeny genotype — simulFS
text: Wu, R., Ma, C., & Casella, G. (2007). Statistical genetics quantitative traits: linkage, maps QTL. Springer Science & Business Media.

title: Function to simulate full sib progeny genotype — simulFS
text: Martin Nahuel Garcia <orcid:0000-0001-5760-986X>

title: Function to simulate full sib progeny genotype — simulFS
code: #simulate 100 individuals and 1000 SNPs set.seed(123) simGeno(100, 1000) #> [1] "simG was generated" #[1] "simG was generated" #simulate the genotype of 5 FS from 3 pairs of parents simulFS(simG[1:3,],simG[4:6,],5) #> [1] "simulatedFS was generated" #[1] "simulatedFS was generated"  dim(simulatedFS) #> [1]   15 1000 #[1]   15 1000 # The first 5 individuals are progeny of mom 1 and dad 1, the second 5 individuals # are progeny of mom 2 and dad 2, and so on.

what: Function to simulate half sib progeny genotypes — simulHS
title: Function to simulate half sib progeny genotypes — simulHS
text: Simulate half sib progeny one genotyped parent assuming random genotype parental. assume diploid organisms.

title: Function to simulate half sib progeny genotypes — simulHS
Function to simulate half sib progeny genotypes — simulHS
text: x genotype matrix set moms Nprogeny number progeny's genotypes simulate mom

title: Function to simulate half sib progeny genotypes — simulHS
text: function assume: diploid organism; mendelian segregation alleles; independent segregation.

title: Function to simulate half sib progeny genotypes — simulHS
text: matrix dimensions (nrow(x)*Nprogeny) x ncol(x)

title: Function to simulate half sib progeny genotypes — simulHS
text: Wu, R., Ma, C., & Casella, G. (2007). Statistical genetics quantitative traits: linkage, maps QTL. Springer Science & Business Media.

title: Function to simulate half sib progeny genotypes — simulHS
text: Martin Nahuel Garcia <orcid:0000-0001-5760-986X>

title: Function to simulate half sib progeny genotypes — simulHS
code: #' #simulate 100 individuals and 1000 SNPs set.seed(123) simGeno(100, 1000) #> [1] "simG was generated" #[1] "simG was generated" #simulate the genotype of 3 sets 5 HS (one set by mom) simulHS(simG[1:3,],5) #> [1] "simulatedHS was generated" #[1] "simulatedHS was generated" dim(simulatedHS) #> [1]   15 1000 #[1]   15 1000

what: Function to simulate a SNP matrix, a phenotypic trait and the effects of associated SNPs. — simulN
title: Function to simulate a SNP matrix, a phenotypic trait and the effects of associated SNPs. — simulN
text: function simulate SNP matrix (coded 0, 1, 2) traits selected number QTLs effects sampled Normal distribution.

title: Function to simulate a SNP matrix, a phenotypic trait and the effects of associated SNPs. — simulN
code: simulN(Nind, Nmarkers, Nqtl, Esigma, Pmean, Perror)

title: Function to simulate a SNP matrix, a phenotypic trait and the effects of associated SNPs. — simulN
text: Nind number individuals simulate. Nmarkers number SNP markers generate. Nqtl number QTLs controlling trait. Esigma standard deviation effects distribution N~(0,Esigma^2). Pmean phenotype mean. Perror standard deviation error (portion phenotype explained genomic information).

title: Function to simulate a SNP matrix, a phenotypic trait and the effects of associated SNPs. — simulN
text: Genotypic data simulated round value sampled uniform distribution interval (-.5,2.5). Phenotypic data obtained linear function defined : $$y = Pmean + \sum QTN*Meffects + Perror $$

title: Function to simulate a SNP matrix, a phenotypic trait and the effects of associated SNPs. — simulN
text: object class list containing SNP matrix, trait, markers associated effects. geno SNP matrix generated. pheno vector trait values simulated. QTN column SNP matrix SNP associated. Meffects effects associated SNPs.

title: Function to simulate a SNP matrix, a phenotypic trait and the effects of associated SNPs. — simulN
text: Wu, R., Ma, C., & Casella, G. (2007). Statistical genetics quantitative traits: linkage, maps QTL. Springer Science & Business Media.

title: Function to simulate a SNP matrix, a phenotypic trait and the effects of associated SNPs. — simulN
text: Martin Nahuel Garcia <orcid:0000-0001-5760-986X>

title: Function to simulate a SNP matrix, a phenotypic trait and the effects of associated SNPs. — simulN
text: genotype simulated way simGeno function.   trait, QTLs effects simulated way simPheno function.

title: Function to simulate a SNP matrix, a phenotypic trait and the effects of associated SNPs. — simulN
